title: 1966 Titleholders Championship
text:
The 1966 Titleholders Championship was the 27th <a href="Titleholders%20Championship">Titleholders Championship</a>, held November 24–27 at Augusta Country Club in <a href="Augusta%2C%20Georgia">Augusta, Georgia</a>. <a href="1965%20Titleholders%20Championship">Reigning champion</a> <a href="Kathy%20Whitworth">Kathy Whitworth</a> successfully defended her title and won the second of her six <a href="Women%27s%20major%20golf%20championships">major</a> titles, two strokes ahead of runners-up <a href="Judy%20Kimball">Judy Kimball</a> and <a href="Mary%20Mills%20%28golfer%29">Mary Mills</a>.
It was Whitworth's 28th victory on the <a href="LPGA%20Tour">LPGA Tour</a> and ninth of the <a href="1966%20LPGA%20Tour">1966</a> season.
Mills was the 54-hole leader at 217 (+1), with Whitworth and Kimball a stroke back.
This was the last time the championship was held in Augusta; it took a hiatus and resumed six years later for one time only in <a href="1972%20Titleholders%20Championship">1972</a> in <a href="North%20Carolina">North Carolina</a>.
Final leaderboard.
"Sunday, November 27, 1966"
